description: This file is a React component for the root layout of a Remix-run based application, configuring global styles, links, and scripts, and defining the main App component which renders the Outlet.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links and stylesheets for the document, including Google Fonts and preconnects.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that sets up the HTML structure with metadata, styles, and scripts.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that renders nested routes via Outlet.
